nodes.text: The Black Venom Sea was a region of space in the Tatoo system inhabited by the Black Sun.

The potent pursuer of illegitimate activities, the Black Suns, coursed through the veins of the Black Venom Sea, dominating the area with heavy laser fire and lethal missiles. During the Galactic Civil War, the Black Suns hid behind Tatooine's shadow, waiting for the perfect time to strike with deadly precision and claim Tatooine's system as their own.
